definition: something shown to the public, walk ostentatiously
details:
noun
- something shown to the public
= example: something shown to the public
= synonyms: showing
- an object or statement produced before a court of law and referred to while giving evidence
verb
- walk ostentatiously
= synonyms: march
- to show, make visible or apparent
= example: to show, make visible or apparent
= synonyms: display
- give an exhibition of to an interested audience
= synonyms: show, present, demo, demonstrate
- show an attribute, property, knowledge, or skill
= example: show an attribute, property, knowledge, or skill
